00053 namespace co

00055 
00057 class DataOStreamArchive
00058     : public boost::archive::basic_binary_oarchive< DataOStreamArchive >
00059 {
00060     typedef boost::archive::basic_binary_oarchive< DataOStreamArchive > Super;
00061 
00062 public:
00064     CO_API DataOStreamArchive( DataOStream& stream );
00065 
00067     CO_API void save_binary( const void* data, std::size_t size );
00068 
00070     template< typename T >
00071     void save_array( const boost::serialization::array< T >& a, unsigned int );
00072 
00074     struct use_array_optimization
00075     {
00076         template< class T >
00077         struct apply
00078             : public boost::serialization::is_bitwise_serializable< T > {};
00079     };
00080 
00081 private:
00082     friend class boost::archive::save_access;
00083 
00090     CO_API void save( bool b );
00091 
00093     template< class C, class T, class A >
00094     void save( const std::basic_string< C, T, A >& s );
00095 
00103     template< typename T >
00104     typename boost::enable_if< boost::is_integral<T> >::type save( const T& t );
00105 
00133     template< typename T >
00134     typename boost::enable_if< boost::is_floating_point<T> >::type
00135     save( const T& t );
00136 
00137 #if BOOST_VERSION >= 104400
00138     // in boost 1.44 version_type was splitted into library_version_type and
00139     // item_version_type, plus a whole bunch of additional strong typedefs
00140     CO_API void save( const boost::archive::library_version_type& version );
00141     CO_API void save( const boost::archive::class_id_type& class_id );
00142     CO_API void save( const boost::serialization::item_version_type& class_id );
00143     CO_API
00144     void save( const boost::serialization::collection_size_type& class_id );
00145     CO_API void save( const boost::archive::object_id_type& object_id );
00146     CO_API void save( const boost::archive::version_type& version );
00147 #endif
00148 
00149     CO_API void _saveSignedChar( const signed char& c );
00150 
00151     DataOStream& _stream;
00152 };
